Following this, a calcification diagram with osteocytes in lacunae and canaliculi is on screen while the speaker describes mineral salts hardening the matrix. Then, the slide "Intramembranous Ossification, cont." lists formation of trabeculae and periosteum as the speaker notes spaces for blood vessels and red marrow. Finally, a slide titled "Endochondral Ossification" appears as the speaker states cartilage is replaced by bone.
